INTRODUCTION Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 List of Acronyms and Abbreviations Pro Line Fusion® Avionics

AFCS Automatic Flight Control System AFD Adaptive Flight Display AFDX Avionics Full Duplex AFGS Autopilot Flight Director Guidance System AFM Aircraft Flight Manual AGL Above Ground Level AGS ARINC 661 Graphics Server AHRS Attitude/Heading Reference System AISOV Anti-ice Shut Off Valve AM Amplitude Modulation AME Amplitude Modulation Equivalent AMM Airport Moving Map AOA Angle Of Attack AOC Air Operations Center AP Autopilot APM Aircraft Personality Module APU Auxiliary Power Unit ARINC Aeronautical Radio, INCorporated AT Autothrottle ATC Air Trafﬁc Control ATN Aeronautical Telecommunications Network ATS Air Trafﬁc Services BARO Barometric BFO Beat Frequency Oscillator CAS Crew Alerting System CCM Common Computing Module CCP Cursor Control Panel CDI Course Deviation Indicator CDTI Cockpit Display of Trafﬁc Information CNS Communications, Navigation, and Surveillance COM Communications CPDLC Controller/Pilot Datalink Communication CVR Cockpit Voice Recorder CVS Combined Vision System CW Continuous Wave DCM Data Concentrator Module DCP Display Control Panel DCS Data Concentration System DH Decision Height DISC Disconnect DLCA Data Link Communication Application

5th Edition 1-4 02 APR 19

Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 INTRODUCTION Pro Line Fusion® Avionics List of Acronyms and Abbreviations

DMC Data Concentrator Module Cabinet DME Distance Measuring Equipment DSK Double Stack Knob DSM Digital Switching Module DU Display Unit E-Charts Electronic Charts E-Map Enhanced Map EAIV Engine Anti-Ice Valve EAK Encrypted Access Key ECS Environmental Control System ECU External Compensation Unit EFIS Electronic Flight Instrument System EGT Exhaust Gas Temperature EICAS Engine Indication and Crew Alert System EIS Engine Indicating System ESVS Enhanced Synthetic Vision System ET Elapsed Time EVS Enhanced Vision System FADEC Full Authority Digital Electronic Control FAF Final Approach Fix FANS Future Air Navigation System FBW Fly-By-Wire FCC Flight Control Computers FCP Flight Control Panel FCS Flight Controls System FCSA Flight Control System Application FCV Flow Controls Valve FD Flight Director FF Fuel Flow FIM Fault Isolation Manual FLIR Forward Looking Infrared FM Frequency Modulation FMS Flight Management System FMSA Flight Management System Application FPARC Flight Path Angle Reference Cue FPV Flight Path Vector FQ Fuel Quantity GA Go Around GEN Generator GPS Global Positioning System GPU Ground Power Unit

5th Edition 02 APR 19 1-5
